title: Did Adam & Eve Have Bellybuttons?: And 199 Other Questions from Catholic Teenagers
description: This book is the #1 book teens turn to for answers on their Catholic Faith. It inspires, informs and challenges teens. With over 125,000 copies sold, Did Adam & Eve Have Belly Buttons? is the top teen book in the Church, five straight years in a row. Each year, literally hundreds of parishes and schools use Did Adam & Eve? with their teens. It gets read and changes hearts!
author: Matthew J. Pinto
